slides.headline: Baseball Rules!
slides.sub_header: A short introduction to the world of baseball

slides.headline: The Diamond
bullet_points: The baseball field is a diamond shape

slides.headline: Three Strikes and you are out
bullet_points: Throws, or Pitches, are called a strike
Four balls and the batter is allowed to advance
Three strikes and the batter is out
Three outs and the teams swap places

slides.headline: Scoring Runs
bullet_points: A run is scored when a runner crosses home plate.
The team with the most runs at the end of the game wins.
If the game is tied, extra innings are played until one team scores
